projects.description: A real estate website showcasing properties with modern design and user-friendly interface.
A multilingual church website that supports internationalization for diverse communities.
An interactive gaming platform built with Next.js, featuring various game genres and community interactions.
A personal portfolio website for Bibiana Garcia, highlighting her work in design and development.
A professional portfolio showcasing Genaro Pedrazzoli's projects and skills in web development.
A Netflix replica application demonstrating a similar user experience and functionality.
A travel website dedicated to exploring Egypt's rich culture and attractions.
A language learning platform inspired by Duolingo, featuring interactive lessons and quizzes.
An e-commerce website built for a coding bootcamp, showcasing various products and a smooth shopping experience.
